thread.title: Tracey and James Downey
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Tracey and James Downey

author: Tracey and James Downey
title: Tracey and James Downey
text: I am happy with Energia but I will be a year with them in April and I am hoping that my charges will not go up most companies look after new customers very well and then after a year they seem to forget about them. If my charges go up or if I am not looked after for loyalty I will move in April. Thank you
